Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.rmi

Class ServerConnectionRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.rmi.ServerConnectionRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerConnectionRMIInterface, ServerConnection, Serializable, Remote
public class ServerConnectionRMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ServerConnection, ServerConnectionRMIInterface
Class representing a RMI connection to (and from) a client. The send methods guarantee thread-safety. Usage: construct an instance of the class by passing to the constructor the listener. Moreover, call the start method to start listening for Beeps from the client and to start sending messages.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerConnectionRMI

      public ServerConnectionRMI(ClientConnectionRMIInterface client) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new ServerConnectionRMI. It sets the clientRMI interface.
      Parameters:
      client - The clientRMI interface.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Rmi exception. It is the one thrown by the no-args constructor of UnicastRemoteObject.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Start listening for messages from the network. Starts the timer that constantly checks whether a Beep from client has arrived. Moreover, it starts the Thread that will be listening for messages to send (in the sendingQueue) and will be calling the appropriate clientRMI methods.
      Specified by:
      start in interface ServerConnection

    • setServerInputViewInterface

      public void setServerInputViewInterface(ServerInputViewInterface receiver)
      Sets the listener of the connection. It will be notified as new messages from the client.
      Specified by:
      setServerInputViewInterface in interface ServerConnection
      Parameters:
      receiver - the listener.
